TopicTitle: Some modded parts won't show up in VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi, I am having trouble with my ksp game.  The problem is that we upload a mod to ksp and only some parts show up from the mod.  We use a MacBook Air.  Do you have any solutions?

Thank You!

i don't use a mac but if the mod is not uptodate with your version of ksp then only some things will work if that's not the problem then you need to make sure your putting all of the correct files in the game data folder.

which mod did you use. If it comes as a zip file, expand it and copy the contents of the folder into the GameData folder of the KSP folder.

Spoiler

Paste the items inside this folder. If you have never uploaded a mod before, you will see a Squad folder. Don't open that folder.
